subject: re:Special offer from our store
body:
Dear valued member.
You have an excellent opportunity to save money purchasing your products.
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
Click here to checkhttp://canthis.hk
Great selection of pharmaceutical products.There are no risks of being scammed or receiving faked products. 
Yours faithfully,Walter Cummins
